comments.body:
I think we'll want to have some test cases for invalid data. We may have some already that you can reuse. But I think we'd want to cover the following cases:
1. invalid key size (too big, too small)
2. invalid value size (too big, too small)
3. invalid num headers (null, too many, too few)
4. invalid header key (too big, too small)
5. invalid value key (too big, too small)
6. missing header value?
6: you mean missing header key right?
